content:
I am trying out the crate "thiserror". I ran into a case where I have an error condition that is a generic std::sync::mpsc::SendError<T>

not sure how to handle this... I might have different types T in the same function in which case how would I roll them up to my custom Error type.
I think my solution will be to just write my own From<mpsc::SendError<T>> impl and use the thiserror macros for everything else
